How to Get Your Recut API Key:

Visit the Recut Website
Go to the official Recut URL Shortener website.

Login or Sign Up
If you already have an account, click Login at the top right and enter your details.
If you're new, click Sign Up to create a free account.

Access Your Dashboard
After logging in or signing up, you will be redirected to your account dashboard.

Finding Your API Key (For PC/Laptop Users):
Click on your profile icon in the top-right corner.
From the menu, choose Settings.
Your API key will be visible on the right side of the Settings page.

Finding Your API Key (For Mobile Users):
Tap the gear icon (âš™ï¸) in the top-right corner.
Select Settings from the menu and scroll down to find your API key.

Optional: Regenerate Your API Key
If you believe your key has been compromised, or you want to keep it secure, you can regenerate the key by clicking the Regenerate button in the Settings section.
